ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.imu

Class IMU

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.imu.IMU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIMU

    public class IMU
extends java.lang.Object
implements IIMU
    Determine the Pitch, Yaw, Roll and Heading with the help of a gyro, accelerometer and magnetometer information form the parameter store Implementation of Madgwick's IMU and AHRS algorithms. See: http://www.x-io.co.uk/node/8#open_source_ahrs_and_imu_algorithms
    Author:
    pschatzmann
